parameters: Merchant-like man: My son... damn it... where on earth...!
Merchant Strah: I apologize for causing you trouble as well.
Clea: Please don't worry about it.

Merchant Strah: By the way, what kind of person is your
son's colleague?

Mage Relm: I am also a member of the academy, but Dokusa-
san is, how should I put it... quite unique.

Mage Relm: He's not a bad person, but hmm, I would say
that's what makes his mischievousness stand out.

Researcher Dokusa: It is my responsibility that your son
ended up like this. There is no excuse... I am truly sorry.

Researcher Dokusa: I should have done whatever it took to
stop him when he said he was going to chase after the Mage
of Evil Stones.

Researcher Dokusa: He often talks about you. He says you're
his proud son, and it makes me feel embarrassed and happy.

Merchant Strah: Please raise your head. You are my son's
friend, and I understood that just from our conversation
now.

Merchant Strah: And if this statue is my son himself... If
he has been petrified by magic, is there no way to return
him to normal?

Mage Relm: There is no method. There are magic spells that
even skilled practitioners cannot undo.

Mage Relm: Magic is a combination of complex formulas to the
extent that it can petrify humans. It is almost impossible
to unravel.

Merchant Strah: Dokusa-san... would you allow my son to stay
by your side and request your help in finding a way to undo
the petrification for everyone?

Researcher Dokusa: It is my responsibility, so of course.
Not only me, but Assistant Candidate No. 3 will also help
with that request!

Mage Relm: Sigh... Once again, getting involved without
permission... Since I've been dragged into this, I'll stick
with it until the end.

Storge of Compassion: I'll leave this request to Clea.
Please find a way to undo the petrification somehow.

Storge of Compassion: I'm going to report to Shimos and
Agonia. I have to treat Shimos to a drink as a thank you.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Merchant Strah: I'm looking forward to the day when I can
talk to my son again.
Merchant Stora: Please take care of my son...

Merchant Stora: Thank you so much... It's all thanks to you
guys.

Researcher Dokusa: I don't know what will happen when the
magician of the evil stone is released from petrification.

Researcher Dokusa: I can't completely discard the
possibility of the worst-case scenario, which is a battle.

Should we stab the golden needle into the researcher's stone
statue?
Clea (Let's prepare first and then do it)

Magician Relm: I will stab the needle, everyone. Are you
ready and prepared?

Researcher Dokusa: Strah, please stay away. There might be a
battle happening here.

Merchant Strah: Please let me witness this. All these people
have come here for the sake of my son.

Clea: Understood, Mr. Strah. I will protect you no matter
what happens.

Researcher Dokusa: After the nightmare of the Lapis is over,
I hope everything returns to normal...!
Researcher Mono: T-This is... Dokusa-san... even father?

Merchant Strah: I'm glad, really glad! Thanks to everyone,
my son has come back... ugh

Researcher Dokusa: It might take a little while, but let's
talk about what happened to you with Lapis and what they did
for you.

Researcher Mono: I can't thank you enough, Dokusa-san and
all of you. Although I feel a sense of discomfort in my
body, returning to the academy is not just a dream.

Researcher Mono: Thank you so much, Dokusa-san. I'm also
relieved that you had an excellent assistant.
Magician Relm: I am not Dokusa-san's assistant--

Researcher Dokusa: She doesn't seem like the kind of
magician who would settle as my assistant... She will
eventually become an Archmage.

Researcher Dokusa: As a researcher, I can confidently say
that she is one of the magicians I admire.
Magician Relm: U-Um, t-thank you very much...

Researcher Dokusa: It seems that the Golden Needle is
disposable.

Researcher Dokusa: I want you to accept this ring that I
made by reworking it as a reward from me.

Researcher Dokusa: I will go to help the other petrified
people. It should be a big job... I'll be waiting forever.

Researcher Mono: Yes, I will definitely return to the
academy!

Researcher Dokusa: Hurry, let's face the threat to the world
once again!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
実績 助手１号の帰還

Researcher Character: Little by little, my body is starting
to move. I want to return to the Magic Academy and resume my
research as soon as possible.

Researcher Character: I'm really grateful for all your help.
I can only give you this, but feel free to use it if you'd
like.

Mage Relm: We can't get out because Dokusa is in the way,
you know!

Researcher Dokusa: I have something to tell Assistant
Candidate No. 3.

Mage Relm: What exactly is Assistant Candidate No. 3, to
begin with?
Mage Relm: It seems like a serious conversation.

Researcher Dokusa: I once had two assistants, one of them
turned into a statue.

Researcher Dokusa: The other one was a researcher named
Albus, who was hailed as a genius.

Mage Relm: I read the papers and research materials written
by Albus. Aren't you the renowned crystal researcher in the
academy!?

Researcher Dokusa: He was conducting research on a peculiar
crystal, not a special one.

Researcher Dokusa: That is something I happened to discover
in the ruins, and he became my assistant on the condition of
researching that crystal.

Researcher Dokusa: But that was a mistake... He was
completely captivated, not just casually immersed.
Clea: Do we have any clues?

Researcher Dokusa: There are some materials that he left
behind. Of course, they are encrypted, and I am currently
deciphering them.

Researcher Dokusa: The request from me is to find the
whereabouts of the missing Albus.

Researcher Dokusa: If the encryption is deciphered, I want
you to prioritize other tasks since you all must be busy,
and add it to the academy's bulletin board.

Thief Nora: Why were you calling me a candidate for
assistant?

Priestess Sophia: Perhaps he thought that if he made me his
true assistant, he would disappear.

Mage Relm: Hmph, I don't appreciate being underestimated...
And besides, I never agreed to become his assistant even if
he asked!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Researcher Dokusa: I'm investigating the state of the
statues. Have you made any progress?
Mage Relm: Actually, I found out about Albus's whereabouts.

Researcher Dokusa: I want you to tell me in detail,
including the reason why he is not with you...

Researcher Dokusa: Fused with a crystal, huh... If only I
hadn't handed over that crystal back then...!
Mage Relm: Dokusa-san asked me to apologize.

Researcher Dokusa: I see... I understand. If he is still
alive, even if his physical body is gone, then that's good!

Researcher Dokusa: Let's search for a way to cure the Monos.
I will never give up on them!

Mage Relm (Albus said he fused with knowledge, so maybe he
knows something about petrification...!)
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
実績 クリスタルの中の囚人
Mage Relm: I've figured out how to undo petrification!

Researcher Dokusa: I-Is it true!? Just who taught you such a
method...

Mage Relm: Albus-san knew. Their knowledge surpasses that of
mere humans.
Mage Relm: That's why I can't leave...

Mage Relm: More importantly, I've realized that we need a
mage who can perform high-precision gold processing.
Researcher Dokusa: I see, in that case, there's no problem.

Priestess Sophia: As expected of someone well-connected.
Where should we go?

Researcher Dokusa: Relm-kun, please tell me about the
processing shape.

Mage Relm: Please process the gold into a needle shape. I
will convey the knowledge in my head, so please listen
carefully.

Researcher Dokusa: I understand, it seems like it will be
quite a delicate task.
Mage Relm: No way, Dokusa-san is going to do it--

Researcher Dokusa: The alchemy demon... Pedon, transform
this pure gold into a golden needle that will save us all!
Clea: A-Amazing, it turned into a needle in an instant.

Thief Nora: Wow, amazing! You're not just some weird person
after all!

Mage Relm: Wait, wait! I didn't know you could use magic
like this!

Mage Relm: Intermediate... No, isn't this an advanced
sorcerer class!?

Researcher Dokusa: I don't have any affiliation with the
prestigious researcher academy or any official position.

Researcher Dokusa: If I could take action for the sake of
something, even just a little, instead of relying on all of
you, I would be happy.

Researcher Dokusa: Now, let's undo the petrification of this
object!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Researcher Dokusa: I hope nothing happens...

events.name: QI『訳ありのオークション』
